name: Oren
description: Oren comes from a long line of miners and specializes in gathering Ore.

name: Eryn
description: Eryn carefully chooses which trees to chop down to produce Wood.

name: Herbie
description: Herbie is a fledgling botanist and spends his days collecting Herbs.

name: Lakur
description: Lakur is a skilled hunter and earns her living by producing Leather.

name: Harmony
description: Harmony has a black market supplier, and expertly refines Bone.

name: Frederik
description: Frederik hopes to become a designer, but for now, creates Fabric.

name: Magnolia
description: Magnolia was taught by her mother to produce high quality Steel.

name: Sylvester
description: Sylvester relies on reputable ore traders to smelts his Silver.

name: Pippa
description: Pippa has excellent attention to detail, and it shows in her Paper.

name: Manny
description: Manny has perfected a very delicate technique to gather Mana.

name: Hardy
description: Hardy has two passions: being a good big brother, and mining Ore.

name: Wendy
description: Wendy is trying to emulate Eryn, and the second step is making Wood.

name: Blossom
description: Blossom loves being outdoors, and enjoys her time collecting Herbs.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky finds it's best not to think too hard about how he makes Leather.

name: Floyd
description: Floyd has a special, one-of-a-kind relationship with Bone.

name: Tricia
description: Tricia is a hard-working student, hoping to learn all she can about Fabric.

name: Remington
description: Remington works very hard, providing only the highest quality Steel.

name: Renae
description: Renae enjoys getting her hands dirty when she processes Silver.

name: Paula
description: Paula is an excellent understudy, and is getting better at making Paper.

name: Jewel
description: Jewel doesn't enjoy her job, but her bills get paid by gathering Mana.

name: Oren
description: Oren comes from a long line of crafters.

name: Eryn
description: Eryn carefully chooses which materials to use.

name: Herbie
description: Herbie is a fledgling botanist in his spare time.

name: Lakur
description: Lakur is a skilled hunter and is proud to use her own products.

name: Tiny
description: Tiny is a hard-working student, hoping to learn all he can.

name: Crash
description: Crash relies on reputable traders for raw materials.

name: Titan
description: Titan often finds himself moderating disputes in the shop.

name: Smash
description: Smash has excellent attention to detail, and it shows.

name: Francis
description: Francis wants to be the very best, the best that ever was.

name: Squeaks
description: Squeaks is shy around new customers, but is very loyal.

name: Renae
description: Renae was taught by her mother to produce high quality goods.

name: Tawny
description: Tawny secretly moonlights as a dancer after business hours.

name: Gilbert
description: Gilbert is an excellent understudy with a bright future.

name: Gillian
description: Gillian has a underground black market supplier.

name: Gilfred
description: Gilfred hopes to become a designer one day.

name: Gilda
description: Gilda doesn't enjoy her job, but her bills get paid on time.
